channel.title: Click here to get hamachi and guide! (WITH PICS)
channel.description:
This is the last and final time i post this guide!!!Ok, i had it with the people that dont know how to get hamachi so i made a really simple guide to get it! for the people that dont know what hamachi is... Its a program that you can join network servers and will allow your IP to get in that server! Ok lets start the guide...
First, Go to this website http://www.hamachi.cc/download/
Now when you get to that website you then scroll down a little, then you see a download button, click it... And begin download! Heres a pic....
[IMG]http://i122.photobucket.com/albums/o243/sebastianm10/kjstriujtmntd.jpg[/img]
Now you have Hamachi!! CONGRATS! Now lets start the guide to how to use it...
Ok now connect Hamachi... You should see a grey box and its empty, ok lets use an example, umm... ok whatever lets use mine, now go on the bottom of the grey box and you should see 1 button on the left and 2 buttons on the right... click the the button thats on the right with the 3 stars on it... now it should pop up and say Networking menu: Create new network, Join existing network... CLICK JOIN EXISTING NETWORK!!! now something will pop up saying network name ect. now click the box under network name and put revolationscape then put for the password put 1234 Now click JOIN!!!! now you should see in the grey box some names, now after you done all that you can start playing on hamachi servers CONGRATS!!!!:D any questions just right click Mod Revolution and press chat and ask any questions needed!!!! Heres a pic:
[IMG]http://i122.photobucket.com/albums/o243/sebastianm10/kjwt5ktkmtek.jpg[/img]
[glow=red,2,300]NOW YOU CAN PLAY HAMACHI!!![/glow]
Ok, once you have that hamachi, you then open your client and start type in the name of the server, or IP... then you can start playing... People are making mistakes about Pinging people, thats nothing, dont worry about that, once your on the list then thats it.. you can get on the server
Give this guide all credit to: (ME )
